name: TANKGAL saves the world?
description:
Meet TankGal!

 TankGal likes to blow things up, with tanks!

she doesn't know how to control a tank, but she knows how to press the button that makes tank shoot, and that's all she needs. now that the world's in danger it's her time to shine...?

A simple arcade shooter game!  This is my first foray into solo gamedev so i decided to make something simple to learn the ropes! it's not much but i do hope you enjoy the game even a lil bit!

______________________________________________________________

Extra credits:

Music : [Out of time ]  From Three red hearts, Prepare to dev edition

SFX : Kenny's Game Assets 1
